statements: UPDATE lighting_preferences SET brightness = 50, color_temperature = 3000 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE lighting_preferences SET color_temperature = 4000, brightness = 75 WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE lighting_preferences SET brightness = 75, color_temperature = 5000 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE lighting_preferences SET color_temperature = 4000, brightness = 80 WHERE schedule_id = 2;

UPDATE users_preferences SET lighting_schedule = '{"morning": "on", "afternoon": "off"}', lighting_settings = '{"brightness": 50, "color": "yellow"}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE automation_routines SET active = true, routine_name = 'Morning Routine' WHERE routine_id = '543e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users_preferences SET lighting_schedule = '{"morning": "on", "evening": "off"}', lighting_settings = '{"brightness": 80}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE automation_routines SET active = false, routine_description = 'Turn off all lights in the evening' WHERE routine_id = '98765432-1234-5678-abcd-1234567890ab'
UPDATE users_preferences SET lighting_schedule='Morning' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE lighting_schedules SET end_time='18:00:00', start_time='06:00:00' WHERE schedule_id=1;
UPDATE users_preferences SET lighting_schedule = 'Custom Schedule' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE automation_routines SET action = 'Turn off lights' WHERE routine_id = 456
UPDATE UserPreferences SET lighting_schedule = 'Standard', lighting_settings = 'Bright', automation_routines = 'Morning' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE LightingSchedules SET start_time = '07:00:00', end_time = '21:00:00' WHERE schedule_id = 1;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET lighting_schedule='Morning Schedule', automation_routines='Morning Routine' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE LightingSettings SET brightness_level=80, color_temperature=4000 WHERE setting_id=3;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET lighting_intensity = 75, lighting_schedule = 'Weekday Morning' WHERE user_id = 100
UPDATE LightingSettings SET color_temperature = 5000, brightness_level = 80 WHERE setting_id = 200
UPDATE UserPreferences SET lighting_schedule = 'Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday', lighting_intensity = 80, lighting_color = 'Warm White' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE LightingSettings SET color_temperature = 5000, brightness_level = 70 WHERE schedule_id = 201;
